idea:
Introduction

“Nitya”, the Sanskrit word synonymous for “Perpetual” makes our motto “Perpetual Innovations”. Nitya Innovations LLP formed in Sep 2016, with a focus to initiate “Common and Affordable” Innovative design and development Lab for mid-scale companies for whom having in-house design and development team is not sustainable.

Technology is being upgraded and spread at a speed which is becoming difficult to catch up while engrossed in day to day operations. Also cost of accessing / developing these technologies is very high, at times due to insufficient ROI these companies normally postpone their expansion plans.
Nitya Innovations shall grow to provide such businesses one stop solution for their NPD as well as sustaining product development practices.

The operating model is to access; Integrate/develop technology applications for Partner Companies. Working simultaneously on 3 or more applications of one technology, it shall help bringing down cost of development / implementation for each product.
The partner companies (mutually exclusive in their business / commercial interest) shall agree to use common development platform for their applications and may collaborate further with each other to create a greater commercial WIN.

Short Term focus 

Our Immediate focus is to increase client base by providing solutions to their pain areas utilizing our experience to solve problems. Helping us getting more visibility towards problems in various application areas, and generate revenue for operations. Graduate to own entire product development and sustaining cycle for these customers and establish a capable facility delivering consistently.

Focus Areas in short term
Solar Power Conversion Electronics: MPPT Battery Charger, DC-DC converters, LED drivers with MPPT chargers, Solar Inverters, BLDC drives for Solar Water Pumps, AC-DC Energy Meters,
Battery Health Monitoring
Metering, Monitoring and IOT Platform: Energy Meters, Sensors/Transducers, Communication Gateways, Smart Phone Apps, Could based messaging servers, Wireless Communication Modules, Web based UI.
Electric Vehicles and Charge Transfer Facilities: Battery Chargers, Battery Management Solutions, BLDC drives, VFD Drives, Electronic Braking, BLDC motors, Magnetic Components for wattages more than 200W.

Focus Areas in Long Term

Energy Efficient Systems, Data Analytics, Transportation System Components.

In long term:
Nitya Innovations shall be an Organization Providing Innovative Solutions; commercialized by manufacturing units operated by partners, the products/brand owned by “Nitya Innovations”.
name: NITYA INNOVATIONS LLP

idea:
MetFlux is a healthcare R&D company providing intelligence to health data using a proprietary physiology-based platform. We provide a meaningful interpretation of healthcare data using systemic models of physiology and disease.
We have developed a digital platform using Biosystems Engineering based mathematical models of physiology, which has applications ranging from wellness, disease management and preventive healthcare to drug discovery and clinical data analysis. We provide R&D services for Pharmaceuticals, Neutraceuticals, FMCG and allied sectors. Additionally, our wellness platform enables us to serve healthcare data aggregators, hospitals, corporate/schools, and government agencies for overall wellness management at individual and population levels.
name: METFLUX RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED
